textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Sizing conversion: 0=XS, 1=S, 2=M, 3=L Size & Fit Leg opening: 30in / 76cm Inseam: 33in / 84cm MEASUREMENTS Imported. Dry clean. 100% silk. Fabric: Silk crepe. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Australian sisters Nicky and Simone Zimmermann founded their eponymous label in 1991 and have perfected their dynamic, colorful line. Sunny and sophisticated with strong silhouettes and clever color combinations, Zimmermann epitomizes Australian style. Casual chic with a twist of fun, Zimmermann is perfect for the feminine, jet-setting beach bunny.
